author: pipermerriam
content:
I'm guessing it's from the ping extensions deployment yesterday, but there's a larger number of failures in our latest hive tests: https://discord.com/channels/890617081744220180/1154849948626595910

Client teams should take a look and see what parts (if any) are from their client.

author: kolbyml
content: There isn't any new failures. The only failures are due to Fluffy turning on validation which is what all the clients will do soon enough and the test cases will be updated

author: kolbyml
content: The bot returns anything that did fail, so the numbers look down at the surface level due to the deployment window, where some clients were updated some weren't during the period where teams merged their respective PR's
